title: Database Administrator Expert (SQL Server, PostgreSQL)
description: Mô tả công việc

Database Administration:
- Design, implement, and maintain complex database systems (e.g., Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL).
- Ensure high levels of performance, availability, and security of databases.
- Perform regular database maintenance, backups, and disaster recovery planning.
- Monitor database performance, implement changes, and apply new patches and versions when required.
- Manage database security and permissions.
ETL Development:
- Design, develop, and optimize ETL processes to extract, transform, and load data from various sources into data warehouses.
- Analysts to understand data requirements and translate them into robust ETL workflows.
- Ensure data integrity, quality, and consistency across different data sources and destinations.
- Implement best practices for ETL process design, development, and deployment.
Performance Tuning and Optimization:
- Analyze and resolve database performance issues.
- Optimize SQL queries and ETL processes for efficiency and speed.
- Implement indexing, partitioning, and other optimization techniques to enhance database performance.
- Documentation and Compliance:
- Create and maintain detailed documentation of database configurations, ETL processes, and data workflows.
- Ensure compliance with data governance and security policies.
- Implement and enforce data privacy and security measures.
- Monitor database performance, implement changes, and apply new patches and versions when required.
- Manage database security and permissions.

- Design, develop, and optimize ETL processes to extract, transform, and load data from various sources into data warehouses.

- Ensure data integrity, quality, and consistency across different data sources and destinations.
- Implement best practices for ETL process design, development, and deployment.

yc: Yêu cầu công việc

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
5+ years of experience in database administration and ETL development.
Expert knowledge of relational database management systems (RDBMS) such as Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL.
Proficiency in ETL tools and frameworks (e.g., PDI, AWS Glue, Apache Airflow).
Hands-on experience with scripting languages (e.g., Python).
Strong SQL skills and experience with performance tuning and optimization.
Experience with data warehousing concepts, design, and implementation.
Familiarity with data modeling tools and techniques.
Experience with cloud-based databases and ETL solutions (e.g., AWS RDS, Azure SQL, Google BigQuery).
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.

address: REE Tower, 9 Doan Van Bo, Ward 12, District 4, Ho Chi Minh

ABOUT JOB:
ABOUT JOB:

You will effectively manage DigiWeb’s infrastructure and applications to ensure service stability, service risks are managed effectively, and ongoing service health maintained; ensure database software are patched and current
YOUR JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
YOUR JOB RESPONSIBILITIES

Responsible for the ongoing management and delivery governance of one or more end-to-end Database Services, incorporating Strategy, Design, Run, Provisioning & Deployment, Transition & Change, Consumption, Support, Delivery Performance & Quality, Capacity & Continuity, Issue & Risk Management.
Support the service(s) and environments across the division.
Identifies and addresses risks with the operation of the service
Contributes to the identification of issues / incidents / events that impact agreed service KPIs, SLA’s, Service Health as well as any 3rd party Service Providers.
Responsible for the successful resolution of critical, high, medium and low problems
Provides technical support and direction across service management processes including, incident, problem, change, configuration, capacity, continuity (DR), availability, asset, monitoring and alerting
Utilise appropriate forums and networks to identify opportunities to leverage asset portfolio capabilities
Ensure adequate communication, knowledge sharing and issue resolution across delivery and support teams
Ensure appropriate capacity, risk and security monitoring, disaster recovery and business continuity plans are in place across the portfolio, any issues are to be identified and remediated appropriately
Another important part of the role is to perform On-Call support

Responsible for the ongoing management and delivery governance of one or more end-to-end Database Services, incorporating Strategy, Design, Run, Provisioning & Deployment, Transition & Change, Consumption, Support, Delivery Performance & Quality, Capacity & Continuity, Issue & Risk Management.

yc: Yêu cầu công việc

2-4 years’ experience in Database Technology and delivery, with a strong background in the practical use, design and deployment of large-scale Database infrastructures
2-4 years’ experience with Oracle Database, any experience with PostgreSQL would be an advantage.
Have worked and supported on a critical and highly available 24x7 production system.
Strong development or system administration experience on UNIX/Linux systems. 
Strong experience in Bash shell programming.
Must have installed Oracle software using command line.
Experience with design, implementing and managing enterprise Database and application dependencies and toolsets
Experience with database optimisation and tuning.
Experience on AWS, Azure or Google Cloud Platform.
Experience with Ansible, Terraform, CloudFormation or Azure Resource Manager highly desirable.
Strong awareness and understanding of hardware, networks, software technologies and applications.
Relevant industry certifications
Proven ability to multi task and prioritise assigned tasks.
Tertiary qualification in a Technology discipline or related field
Good communication in English.

title: 05 Database Administrator ( Oracle/ SQL)
company_model: Dịch vụ và Tư vấn giải pháp
linh_vuc: Dịch Vụ và Tư Vấn IT
description: Mô tả công việc

Thực hiện các công việc được giao liên quan đến: Cài đặt, cấu hình, sao lưu, phục hồi theo dõi và xử lý sự cố CSDL. 
Tối ưu hóa hệ thống cơ sở dữ liệu Giải quyết các vấn đề phức tạp liên quan đến: hiệu suất CSDL, dung lượng cơ sở dữ liệu, khả năng phục hồi, tính ổn định/ liên tục của CSDL, sao chép và các khía cạnh quan trọng khác của hệ quản trị cơ sở dữ liệu. 
Đảm bảo vận hành theo đúng quy trình và cập nhật thường xuyên các quy trình vận hành hệ thống liên quan. 
Thực hiện các công việc khác liên quan tới quản trị CSDL theo phân công.

yc: Yêu cầu công việc

Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên chuyên ngành CNTT hoặc bằng cấp tương đương. 
Sử dụng thành thạo Linux, Windows Server 
Tối thiểu 2 năm kinh nghiệm quản trị, vận hành các hệ thống CSDL Oracle, SQLServer 
Kiến thức chuyên sâu về quản lý cơ sở dữ liệu, bảo mật, tối ưu hóa hiệu suất và xử lý sự cố. 
Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các loại cơ sở dữ liệu khác như MySQL, Redis, MongoDB là một lợi thế. 
Chịu được áp lực công việc, theo dõi hệ thống và xử lý sự cố bất cứ khi nào. 
Có lý lịch rõ ràng, nếu đã có lý lịch tư pháp là một lợi thế
